text: Ara taderake hatyakara yekhane pa'o sekhane'i ebam taderake bera kare da'o sekhana theke yekhana theke tara bera kareche tomaderake. Bastutah phetana phyasada ba danga-hangama srsti kara hatyara ceye'o kathina aparadha. Ara tadera sathe lara'i karo na masajidula haramera nikate yataksana na tara tomadera sathe sekhane lara'i kare. Abasya yadi tara nijera'i tomadera sathe lara'i kare. Tahale taderake hatya kara. E'i hala kapheradera sasti.
